title: Agbe
author: Agbe
created_time: October 28, 2022, 06:09:52 AMLast edit: October 28, 2022, 06:24:43 AM by Agbe
content: A Green Lotto Company in Nigeria refused to pay a man who won 72, 700,000 Naira which is equivalent to 166,119.5000 USD. According to the Green Lotto company they found irregularities (fraudulent activities) in his (gambler's) account. Then according to the gambler, he played the game since 29 January, 2021 with the sum N330,000 which is also equivalent to 754.0500 USD and since then he was trying to claim his win but all attempt failed, therefore, he has no any other option than to sue the casino company to Court. The company said, he has won a big amount and they had paid him before.SourceNigerian Vanguard

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis

comments.body: Yes, this is wrong board.And if I'm not mistaken this topic has been discussed here already: A disheartening true life winning story.
